title: Stripminer2.0+
content:
-- Strip Mining Program V2.0.0 --
-- Includes anti-gravel protocol --
-- Mines until full, then terminates --
-- Connects to central monitor to relay inventory information --
-- Version 2 introduces a more automated algorithm, allowing for deposition of items once full and returning to mining

-- Tunnels are always two wide, 3 high in current version -- 
-- use "label set MiningTurtleX" to name turtles, and set "chn" to the same number

-- Config -- 
ver = "V2.0.0"
Mside = "left" -- set to whatever side the modem is on the turtle
chn = 1 -- set to channel you want to transmit on





-- Defining tables and variables --

local ores = {
	["minecraft:diamond_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:emerald_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:emerald_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:gold_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:iron_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:redstone_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:lapis_ore"]=true,
	["minecraft:coal_ore"]=true,
	["ic2:blockmetal"]=true,
	["galacticraftcore:basic_block_core"] = true
}

local gravel = {
	["minecraft:gravel"]=true
}

local chest = 0
local inv = {}
local Cscan = {}
local logFile = fs.open("minelog", "a")


-- Assinging functions --

function log(data) -- function to write data into minelog file
	logFile.writeLine(data)
end


function minenup(repeats) -- turtle moving up then mining
cl()
print("Mining...")
	for i = 1,repeats do
		turtle.up()
		turtle.dig()
		scan()
		cl()
	print("Mining...")
	end
end

function minend(repeats) -- turtle moving down then mining
cl()
print("Mining...")
	for l = 1,repeats do
		turtle.down()
		turtle.dig()
		scan()
		cl()
	print("Mining...")
	end
end

function scan() -- scanning blocks around turtle
	cl()
	print("Scanning surroundings...")
	
	success, Cscan = turtle.inspectUp()
	if ores[Cscan.name] then
		turtle.digUp()
		log(Cscan.name)
	end
	
	success, Cscan = turtle.inspectDown()
	if ores[Cscan.name] then
		turtle.digDown()
		log(Cscan.name)
	end
			
	
	for i = 1,4 do
		success, Cscan = turtle.inspect()
		if ores[Cscan.name] then 
			log(Cscan.name)
			turtle.dig()
			turtle.turnRight()
		elseif gravel[Cscan.name] then
			while gravel[Cscan.name] do
				turtle.dig()
				success, Cscan = turtle.inspect()
			end
			turtle.turnRight()
		else
			turtle.turnRight()
		end
	end
end

function mineLayer()
	cl()
	print("Mining...")
	for k = 1,2 do
		readInv()
		scan()
		turtle.dig()
		minenup(2)
		turtle.turnLeft()
		turtle.forward()
		turtle.turnRight()
		turtle.dig()
		scan()
		minend(2)
		turtle.forward()
		turtle.turnRight()
		scan()
		turtle.forward()
		turtle.turnLeft()
		chest = chest + 1
		
	end
end

function cl()
	term.clear()
	term.setCursorPos(1,1)
end

function writeFull() -- obsolete
	local startup = fs.open("startup", "w")
	startup.writeLine("term.clear()")
	startup.writeLine("term.setCursorPos(1,1)")
	startup.writeLine("_G.printError('Inventory full, terminating program...')")
	startup.close()
end

function inList(str, list)
	for _,row in ipairs(list) do
		if row[1] == str then
			return true
		end
	end
	return false
end



function readInv() 
	cl()
	print("Reading inventory...")
	sleep(0.5)
	local inv = {}
	table.insert(inv, {"Slot", "Name", "Count"})
	turtle.select(1)
	
	for i = 1,16 do
		turtle.select(i)
		local detail = turtle.getItemDetail(i, true)
		if detail then
			table.insert (inv, {tostring(i), detail.name, tostring(detail.count)})
		end
	end
	turtle.select(1)
	trans(inv)
	check = inList("16", inv)
	if check == true then
		rtb()
	end
end		


function rtb() -- function to return to start and deposit, then go back and carry on
	cl()
	_G.printError("Inventory full, depositing...")
	turtle.turnRight()
	turtle.turnRight()
	for i = 0,chest do
		turtle.forward()
	end
	for i = 1,16 do 
		turtle.select(i)
		turtle.dropDown()
	end
	turtle.select(1)
	turtle.turnRight()
	turtle.turnRight()
	readInv()
	for i = 0,chest do
		turtle.forward()
	end
end



-- Rednet -- 

modem = peripheral.wrap(Mside)
open =  rednet.isOpen()
modem.open(chn)

if open == false then
	cl()
	print("Opening modem...")
	rednet.open(Mside)
	sleep(0.5)
end

function trans(msg)
	cl()
	print("Transmitting to base on channel " .. chn .. "...")
	modem.transmit(chn, 999, msg)
	sleep(0.5)
end







-- Start of program --

cl()

print("Initialising strip mining program " .. ver .. "...")

sleep(1)

-- Main WHILE loop --

repeat
	mineLayer()
until check == true

-- Main WHILE loop --

-- TESTING AREA -- 




if logFile then
	logFile.close() -- closing log file, if still open
end

title: Prison Life
content:
--[[==================================================
     PLAYER VISUAL + AIM LOCK SCRIPT (ALL-IN-ONE)
     - Display name + health (side by side, lifted higher)
     - Team color outlines
     - Q key aim-lock
     - Includes Infinite Yield Admin
==================================================]]

-- Load Infinite Yield Admin
loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/EdgeIY/infiniteyield/master/source'))()

-----------------------------------------------------
-- Services
-----------------------------------------------------
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-----------------------------------------------------
-- Variables
-----------------------------------------------------
local mouse = LocalPlayer:GetMouse()
local holding = false
local lockedTarget = nil

-----------------------------------------------------
-- 1. NAME TAG + HEALTH (SIDE BY SIDE, LIFTED)
-----------------------------------------------------
local function addNameTag(character, plr)
	local head = character:WaitForChild("Head", 5)
	local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
	if not head or not humanoid then return end

	local billboard = Instance.new("BillboardGui")
	billboard.Parent = head
	billboard.Adornee = head
	billboard.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)
	billboard.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 3.2, 0) -- raised higher above the head
	billboard.AlwaysOnTop = true

	local frame = Instance.new("Frame")
	frame.Parent = billboard
	frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	frame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)

	-- Display name
	local nameLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	nameLabel.Parent = frame
	nameLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	nameLabel.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
	nameLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -20, 0.5, 0)
	nameLabel.Text = plr.DisplayName
	nameLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
	nameLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.5
	nameLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
	nameLabel.TextScaled = false
	nameLabel.TextSize = 18

	-- Health (right next to name)
	local healthLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	healthLabel.Parent = frame
	healthLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	healthLabel.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0.5)
	healthLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, nameLabel.TextBounds.X / 2 + 10, 0.5, 0)
	healthLabel.Text = tostring(math.floor(humanoid.Health))
	healthLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
	healthLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.5
	healthLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
	healthLabel.TextScaled = false
	healthLabel.TextSize = 16

	-- Update scaling + position + health
	RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
		if head and head:IsDescendantOf(workspace) and humanoid then
			local distance = (Camera.CFrame.Position - head.Position).Magnitude
			local size = math.clamp(30 - distance / 4, 10, 30)
			nameLabel.TextSize = size
			healthLabel.TextSize = math.clamp(size * 0.8, 8, 22)
			healthLabel.Text = tostring(math.floor(humanoid.Health))
			healthLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, nameLabel.TextBounds.X / 2 + 8, 0.5, 0)
		end
	end)
end

-----------------------------------------------------
-- 2. TEAM OUTLINE (CHARM)
-----------------------------------------------------
local function addOutline(character, teamColor)
	for _, part in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do
		if part:IsA("BasePart") then
			local highlight = Instance.new("Highlight")
			highlight.Parent = part
			highlight.Adornee = part
			highlight.FillTransparency = 1
			highlight.OutlineColor = teamColor.Color
			highlight.DepthMode = Enum.HighlightDepthMode.AlwaysOnTop
		end
	end
end

-----------------------------------------------------
-- 3. AIM LOCK (Q TO LOCK)
-----------------------------------------------------
local function getClosestTorso()
	local closest, shortest = nil, math.huge
	for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
		if plr ~= LocalPlayer and plr.Character and plr.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
			local torso = plr.Character.HumanoidRootPart
			local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(torso.Position)
			if onScreen then
				local dist = (Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y) - Vector2.new(mouse.X, mouse.Y)).Magnitude
				if dist < shortest then
					shortest = dist
					closest = torso
				end
			end
		end
	end
	return closest
end

RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
	if holding and lockedTarget then
		if lockedTarget.Parent and lockedTarget:IsDescendantOf(workspace) then
			Camera.CFrame = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, lockedTarget.Position)
		else
			lockedTarget = nil
		end
	end
end)

UIS.InputBegan:Connect(function(input, gp)
	if not gp and input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Q then
		if not holding then
			lockedTarget = getClosestTorso()
			holding = true
		end
	end
end)

UIS.InputEnded:Connect(function(input, gp)
	if not gp and input.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Q then
		holding = false
		lockedTarget = nil
	end
end)

-----------------------------------------------------
-- 4. APPLY TAGS + OUTLINES TO ALL PLAYERS
-----------------------------------------------------
local function onCharacterAdded(character, plr)
	task.wait(0.5)
	addNameTag(character, plr)
	local teamColor = plr.TeamColor or BrickColor.new("White")
	addOutline(character, teamColor)
end

for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	if plr ~= LocalPlayer then
		plr.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char)
			onCharacterAdded(char, plr)
		end)
		if plr.Character then
			onCharacterAdded(plr.Character, plr)
		end
	end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(plr)
	if plr ~= LocalPlayer then
		plr.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char)
			onCharacterAdded(char, plr)
		end)
	end
end)
